function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Resistance to vaccination and herd immunity efforts","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid spread and global reach of covid-19","category":"Spread of contagious diseases through interconnected devices and networks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of pop-up facilities for community
